text: The South Region is a region in Cameroon. The capital city is Ebolowa. Rivers include the Nyong, Ntem, and Dja. The Dja Faunal Reserve, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is in the region. There is also the Campo Reserve and Mangame Gorilla Sanctuary. ==Government== There are 4 departments: * Dja-et-Lobo * Mvila * Océan * Vallée-du-Ntem Category:Regions of Cameroon Category:1983 establishments in Africa Category:1980s establishments in Cameroon
title: South Region (Cameroon)
